resources.string: "In order to check consciousness: 1.- Shake the victim. 2.- Ask: 'Are you alright?'. ¿Does the victim respond?"
"In order to check consciousness: 1.- Shake the child. 2.- Ask: 'Are you alright?'. ¿Does the child respond?"
"In order to check consciousness: Gently stimulate the baby, patting the sole of the foot and calling him/her by his/her name. ¿Does the baby respond?"
